SEARCH
Package serialComms

Class SerialPortPanel

java.lang.Object
serialComms.SerialPortPanel
public class SerialPortPanel extends Object
Standard panel for entering serial port settings. Should be combined into larger dialog panels.
Author:
Douglas Gillespie
